resources.string: Enthusiastic Full Stack Java Developer with 4 years of experience leading projects through all phases of software development life cycle while implementing latest technologies. Design systems according to OOP standards as well as Java programming principles for frontend and backend applications. Skilled in implementing technologies such as Java, Java EE, JSP, AJAX, RESTful, PrimeFaces, MySQL, and PostgreSQL. Experienced in implementing projects with design patterns, web services, and latest frameworks in financial and commercial business domains.
Address: 1000 North 4th Street, MR#229. Building 141, Room 131. Fairfield, Iowa, United State of America.

Key skills and Experience: Bachelor\'s Degree of Science in Information Technology, 5 years of professional experience in software development using Java Technologies and 1 year as assistant lecturer in C programming, Java and Web Technology.

Experienced Software Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled in jQuery, Databases, Java, Spring Boot, and Play Framework. Strong engineering professional with a Bachelor\'s degree focused in Information Technology from Adventist University of Central Africa.

Programming Languages: Java, C++, C#. Software Development Environment/Framework: Hibernate, Spring, Java Server Faces, Primefaces, ZK, Node.js, AngularJS, Etc. Databases: PostgreSql, MySQL, Sql Server, Oracle, LDAP, MongoDB. Tools: Eclipse, Netbeans, Enterprise Architect, SonarCube, Jenkins, SVN, JMeter. Platforms: Windows, Linux, MacOs.
A. RWANDA MINISTRY OF FINANCE AND ECONOMIC PLANNING, From June 2017 up to now.
B. 4B TECHNOLOGY LIMITED, From June 2014 up to 2017.
2. EJO HEZA – Long Term Saving Scheme (LTSS)

• Designed and implemented the user interfaces (UI). • Designed, documented and developed system functionalities such as: 1. User management module (user role, user permissions, allowed menus, allowed action). 2. Accounting module (Account management, Balance management, Chart of Account). 3. Payment module (Transaction Management, integration with banks and mobile network operators). 4. Agent and Intermediary management (Registration, profile). 5. Agent Commission module. 6. Pre-payment deposit module. 7. Subscriber Benefit claim module. 8. Benefit Payment Module.
• Performed Unit Tests. • Used: JAVA, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Ajax, jQuery, Windows and Linux, Eclipse IDE, Hibernate and Spring Framework, Java Server Faces and Primefaces, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, LDAP, TomCat, Nginx, SonarCube, Jenkins, SVN, JMeter.
UML 2.0 I am experienced in visualize, specify, construct and document software using UML 2.0 language. Tools Enterprise Architect 11 and Rational Rose 7.
2. Computer Programming languages, Frameworks and Tools

Server-Side Development with Java Experienced in developing web based software applications using JSP, Servlets, Java Server Faces2, Struts2, Core Spring Framework 2, Primefaces and Apache Shiro. Client-side development languages and techniques JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Ajax jQuery. Tools Eclipse and NetBeans for software development. SonarCube and Jenkins for code quality review and software testing. Apache Subversion often abbreviated SVN for teamwork sharing and maintain current and historical versions of source code.
Experience in creation and administration of relational databases using Oracle 11g, PostgreSQL9 and MySQL5.
Maharishi University of Management (MUM), Master of Computer Science. 2019, Fairfield, Iowa, United State of America.
Adventist University of Central Africa (AUCA), Bachelor of Information Technology. 2014, Masoro, Kigali, Rwanda.
Ecole Des Science Byimana, Advances Level in Mathematics and Physics. 2008, Byimana, Muhanga, Rwanda.
